title: My Bed is Now a Movie Theater // Bedroom Projector Build with XGIMI Halo

media:group.media:title: My Bed is Now a Movie Theater // Bedroom Projector Build with XGIMI Halo
media:group.media:description:
Some dreams start small, others start with a 6 foot movie screen at the foot of your bed! This video covers my build of a bed-mounted movie screen and projector mount. Big thanks to XGIMI for sending me their Halo portable projector!
